title: Little Sister Annie Skin
body:
Recently, I've been thinking about how great a 'Little Sister Annie' skin would be. There's a lot of Bioshock fans out there (like me) who could tell you how awesome this skin would be. Sadly I don't have any concept art, due to the fact that I have the same artistic skills as a potato, but I do have a couple ideas.

      There are two different ways you could do the skin. Both ways you do it, you dress Annie up like a Little Sister, which means you giver her the same hair style, clothing, eyes, etc. as a little sister from Bioshock (but keep the trademark red hair). Now here's where the differences occur; little sisters are infamous for having a big daddy, who follows them around and kills anything that stands in his or the little sister's way. Now my original idea was to give Tibbers the Big Daddy equipment, but keep him the same for the most part. Things like giving him a drill arm and a diving helmet would fit really well with this skin. The overall combination of the two would make a really nice crossover between the two games, and a lot of Bioshock fans would be crawling over each other to get this skin.

      My second idea for this skin was to make an accompanying 'Big Daddy Nautilus' skin for the 'Little Sister Annie' skin. Just like with Tibbers, you'd give him some of the Big Daddy equipment, although you could really pull of the Big Daddy look on a champion like Nautilus. The only problem with this part is that I wouldn't know what to do with Annie's Tibbers.

       Now, I know that this idea is far fetched, and that it would be a pain in the butt to get licensing and stuff, but as a Bioshock and League of Legends fan, I think this would make a fantastic crossover. I was just hoping that, due to my artistic in ability to create anything, that some of you guys out there could create some art of 'Little Sister Annie' or 'Big Daddy Nautilus' :D. Thanks for reading!!!
